verses.verse: After <S%H310><s%> this <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H7043>cursed<s%> his <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>:
Let the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> wherein I was <S%H3205>born<s%>, And the <S%H3915>night<s%> which <S%H559>said<s%>, There is a <S%H1397>man-child<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%>.
Let that <S%H3117>day<s%> be <S%H2822>darkness<s%>; Let not <S%H433>God<s%> from <S%H4605>above<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> for <S%H5105>it<s%>, Neither let the light shine upon <S%H3313>it<s%>.

Let <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%> <S%H1350>claim<s%> it for their <S%H6053>own<s%>; Let a cloud <S%H7931>dwell<s%> upon <S%H3650>it<s%>; Let all that maketh black the <S%H3117>day<s%> terrify <S%H1204>it<s%>.

As for that <S%H3915>night<s%>, let thick <S%H652>darkness<s%> <S%H3947>seize<s%> upon <S%H2302>it<s%>: Let it not rejoice among the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%>; Let it not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3391>months<s%>.
Lo <S%H3915><s%>, let that night be <S%H1565>barren<s%>; Let no joyful <S%H7445>voice<s%> come <S%H935>therein<s%>.
Let them <S%H5344>curse<s%> it that <S%H779>curse<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%>, Who are <S%H6264>ready<s%> to rouse <S%H5782>up<s%> <S%H3882>leviathan<s%>.

Let the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H5399>twilight<s%> thereof be <S%H2821>dark<s%>: Let it <S%H6960>look<s%> for <S%H216>light<s%>, but have <S%H7200>none<s%>; Neither let it behold the <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning<s%>:
Because it shut not <S%H5462>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of my <S%H990>mother<s%>'s womb, Nor <S%H5641>hid<s%> <S%H5999>trouble<s%> from mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
Why <S%H4191>died<s%> I not from the <S%H7358>womb<s%>? Why did I not give up the <S%H1478>ghost<s%> when my <S%H990>mother<s%> bare <S%H3318>me<s%>?
Why did the <S%H1290>knees<s%> <S%H6923>receive<s%> <S%H7699>me<s%>? Or why the breast, that I should <S%H3243>suck<s%>?
For now should I have lain <S%H7901>down<s%> and been <S%H8252>quiet<s%>; I should have <S%H3462>slept<s%>; then had I been at <S%H5117>rest<s%>,
With <S%H4428>kings<s%> and <S%H3289>counsellors<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, Who <S%H1129>built<s%> up waste places for <S%H2723>themselves<s%>;
Or with <S%H8269>princes<s%> that had <S%H2091>gold<s%>, Who <S%H4390>filled<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H3701>silver<s%>:
Or as a <S%H2934>hidden<s%> untimely <S%H5309>birth<s%> I had not <S%H5768>been<s%>, As infants that never <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H216>light<s%>.
There the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2308>cease<s%> from <S%H7267>troubling<s%>; And there the <S%H3019>weary<s%> are at <S%H5117>rest<s%>.
There the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> are at <S%H7599>ease<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>; They <S%H8085>hear<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5065>taskmaster<s%>.
The <S%H6996>small<s%> and the <S%H1419>great<s%> are <S%H5650>there<s%>: And the servant is <S%H2670>free<s%> from his <S%H113>master<s%>.
Wherefore is <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> to him that is in <S%H6001>misery<s%>, And <S%H2416>life<s%> unto the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> in <S%H5315>soul<s%>;
Who <S%H2442>long<s%> for <S%H4194>death<s%>, but it cometh <S%H2658>not<s%>, And dig for it more than for hid <S%H4301>treasures<s%>;
Who <S%H8056>rejoice<s%> <S%H1524>exceedingly<s%>, And are <S%H7797>glad<s%>, when they can <S%H4672>find<s%> the <S%H6913>grave<s%>?
Why is light given to a <S%H1397>man<s%> whose <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H5641>hid<s%>, And whom <S%H433>God<s%> hath hedged <S%H5526>in<s%>?
For my <S%H585>sighing<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> I <S%H3899>eat<s%>, And my <S%H7581>groanings<s%> are poured <S%H5413>out<s%> like <S%H4325>water<s%>.
For the thing which I <S%H6342>fear<s%> <S%H857>cometh<s%> upon <S%H3025>me<s%>, And that which I am afraid of cometh unto <S%H935>me<s%>.
I am not at <S%H8252>ease<s%>, neither am I <S%H8252>quiet<s%>, neither have I <S%H8252>rest<s%>; But <S%H7267>trouble<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>.
